attributes.action: Go Green and Install Energy Saving Lightbulbs in Number 10 Downing Street
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
After taking the Virtual Tour of number 10 Downing Street, I couldn't help noticing how many lamps and chandaliers you have, all were glowing brightly.

Therefore, I petition the Prime Minister to lead by example and help save the environment by installing energy saving light bulbs in number 10 Downing Street.
